Articles.Content:
After playing this game for hours and experimenting with lot's and lot's of different rockets, I finally manged to get past the 8000 m/s mark, With my Orbiter Mk. X.

Also, thanks to Guywithpants with his Speedy ship's series which became the base of my Orbiter series.
looks like this one thing i found in my moms room..... oh wait >.>
